meanings.sent1: I need to show my rego to the officer.
meanings.sent2: The rego for my car expires next month.
meanings.sent3: The rego was lost in a pile of papers.
meanings.sent4: Her rego was like a golden ticket to enter the event.
meanings.sent5: Don't forget to renew your rego before it expires.

meanings.sent1: I have to rego my car before the deadline.
meanings.sent2: She regos her vehicle online for convenience.
meanings.sent3: He regoed his boat just in time for the summer.
meanings.sent4: They rego their licenses annually without fail.
meanings.sent5: Remember to rego your pet with the local authorities.

meanings.definition: The process of registering a vehicle.
meanings.sent1: The rego of my motorcycle took longer than expected.
meanings.sent2: She completed the rego for her new car smoothly.
meanings.sent3: The rego line at the DMV was surprisingly short.
meanings.sent4: His rego experience was hassle-free and quick.
meanings.sent5: The rego paperwork was neatly organized in a folder.
